Description.Text:
Position The New Bristol Sport Hotel is situated in Cesenatico and only a few steps from the beach.
Restaurant Air conditioned restaurant.
More Informations Last refurbishment took place in 2002.
Sweet and salty buffet breakfast. At lunch and dinner choice between 3 menus with mixed buffet, fruit or dessert.
Accepted credit cards: Eurocard/Mastercard + Visa + American Express.
The clients can use the swimming pool of Hotel Miramare, hotel of the same management and situated about 50 metres from Hotel New Bristol Sport. The swimming pool is open from 08/06/13 to 07/09/13 from 9.00am to 1.00pm and from 3.00pm to 7.00pm.
ACTIVITY: Animation for children/youths in the afternoon or in the evening from 01/06/13 to 01/09/13 daily, except on Sunday. Once a week, from 08/06/13 to 01/09/13, hotel organizes parties, in the same period every sundau the hotel orgenizes aperitif on the veranda for lunch.
FOR WHO BOOKS A STAY OF MIN. 7 NIGHTS IN HB OR FB INCLUDES: beach service with 1 sun umbrella and 2 sun beds per room (single rooms 1 sun umbrella + 1 sun bed) + drinks to the meals which are 1/2 lt of water and 1/4 lt of local wine per person per meal. In bed and breakfast only the drinks are included for who books min. 7 nights.
The clients can make use of the small fitness corner, turkish bath and jacuzzi situated on the terrace of the hotel free of charge.
In Hotel Miramare is available a conference room, use on request on spot against eventually payment.
Check IN: from 2.00pm. Check OUT: until 10.00am.
